mean_cn: n. 专业性；职业水准或特性；职业化
mean_en: the high standard that you expect from a person who is well trained in a particular job; great skill and ability; the practice of using professional players in sport
sentence: The young programmer shows professionalism and enthusiasm in work.
sentence_trans: 这个年轻的程序员展示出工作的专业性与热情。
word_etyma: pro代表 + fess说 + ion表名词 + al……的 +i sm表示“具备某种牲质” → 职业特性
